about_the_game:
Expand your gaming experience with the new official extension for Farming Simulator 17! This DLC contains 18 new implements from KUHN.

The DLC contains the following equipment:
  • KUHN AXIS 40.2 M-EMC -W – Fertilizer spreader
  • KUHN BTF 4000 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN DC 401 - Cultivator
  • KUHN DELTIS 1302 MEA3 – Sprayer
  • KUHN DISCOLANDER XM 52 – Cultivator
  • KUHN ESPRO 3000 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN FBP 3135 – Baler
  • KUHN GF 8702 – Tedder
  • KUHN GMD 4411 – Mower
  • KUHN HR 4004 – Cultivator
  • KUHN LSB 1290 D – Baler
  • KUHN MERGE MAXX 902 – Windrower
  • KUHN METRIS 4102 – Sprayer
  • KUHN PERFORMER 4000 – Cultivator
  • KUHN PF 1500 – Sprayer Front Tank
  • KUHN PLANTER 3R 12 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN SW 4014 AutoLoad – Bale wrapper
  • KUHN TF 1500 – Sowing Machine Front Tank

Once downloaded, the additional content will be available through the in-game shop. Be sure to have sufficient in-game currency to buy them!
detailed_description:
Expand your gaming experience with the new official extension for Farming Simulator 17! This DLC contains 18 new implements from KUHN.

The DLC contains the following equipment:
  • KUHN AXIS 40.2 M-EMC -W – Fertilizer spreader
  • KUHN BTF 4000 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN DC 401 - Cultivator
  • KUHN DELTIS 1302 MEA3 – Sprayer
  • KUHN DISCOLANDER XM 52 – Cultivator
  • KUHN ESPRO 3000 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN FBP 3135 – Baler
  • KUHN GF 8702 – Tedder
  • KUHN GMD 4411 – Mower
  • KUHN HR 4004 – Cultivator
  • KUHN LSB 1290 D – Baler
  • KUHN MERGE MAXX 902 – Windrower
  • KUHN METRIS 4102 – Sprayer
  • KUHN PERFORMER 4000 – Cultivator
  • KUHN PF 1500 – Sprayer Front Tank
  • KUHN PLANTER 3R 12 – Sowing Machine
  • KUHN SW 4014 AutoLoad – Bale wrapper
  • KUHN TF 1500 – Sowing Machine Front Tank

Once downloaded, the additional content will be available through the in-game shop. Be sure to have sufficient in-game currency to buy them!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9.1, 10.10.1, 10.11.1 or 10.12.1
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual-core processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 450 Series, AMD Radeon HD 6770 or better (min 1GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME

name: Farming Simulator 17 - KUHN Equipment Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Farming Simulator 17 - KUHN Equipment Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel or equivalent AMD dual-core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTS 450 Series, AMD Radeon HD 6770 graphics card or better (min 1GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR THE ONLINE GAME
